description.displayText: Gail was so wonderful with my parents. She was dependable, kind and caring. Each of my parents had different needs and Gail was accommodating with both of them. The only reason Gail isn't with us anymore is because my parents moved. We are grateful we found Gail!
description.originalText: Gail was so wonderful with my parents. She was dependable, kind and caring. Each of my parents had different needs and Gail was accommodating with both of them. The only reason Gail isn't with us anymore is because my parents moved. We are grateful we found Gail!

description.displayText: I am blessed to have Gail assist me!
description.originalText: I am blessed to have Gail assist me!

description.displayText: I am the assistant for an elderly woman's conservator.  This is the capacity in which I know Gail.  Gail consistently went above and beyond and treated the woman like family.  Gail has a caring and sweet disposition with her clients.  She is very trustworthy and is great at customizing care based on what a person needs.   She is very mindful of nutrition, budgeting, and planning for upcoming needs.  Gail is also great at communicating and keeping people updated with any important information.  She is dedicated, works extremely hard, and always has her client's best interests at heart.  I would recommend her for elderly care without hesitation.

description.displayText: Gail is such a thoughtful, attentive, and loving caregiver. She is a hard worker and goes the extra mile to make sure those in her care are more than comfortable; she makes them feel special and loved. She truly puts her heart into her work, and I cannot recommend her more strongly.
description.originalText: Gail is such a thoughtful, attentive, and loving caregiver. She is a hard worker and goes the extra mile to make sure those in her care are more than comfortable; she makes them feel special and loved. She truly puts her heart into her work, and I cannot recommend her more strongly.

description.displayText:
Gail took care of my elderly father at the end of his life, from 2016 to 2017, and she is truly gifted with the elderly.  She is kind and warm, and creative in ways to spend time with her clients.  My Dad loved her and looked forward to their time together.
My Dad had asked her to take care of me and my son after he passed, and even though we are not "elderly", Gail has kept our household running ever since!  She comes by twice a week, keeping our house spotless, and running errands, meeting service people, facilitating getting things fixed.  She also is an expert pet sitter, and keeps our two cats and other pet in excellent health and spirits, keeping them fed, clean and healthy.
Gail is a member of our family and we would be lost without her.  You could not go wrong working with her for your household, for your elderly loved one, or for your pets.

description.displayText: I have known Gail for 8 years professionally, as fellow CNA/Caregivers. I can not speak more highly of any other co-worker, other than Gail. Throughout the years she has demonstrated leadership and exceptional work ethic, while at times, under very stressful conditions. She is intelligent, diligent, loyal, & extremely compassionate. Might I add, she has a terrific sense of humor and awesome disposition. At times, her dedication to care-giving superseded her own well-being. I can confidently say that Gail would be a great asset to any employer, & they would be fortunate to have her!

description.displayText:
Gail has worked for me periodically as a database contractor, in support of research on aging in place that my firm conducts for local governments. In that role, she has been dependable, timely and the quality of her work has been impeccable.

In addition, I have known Gail as a friend and colleague for the past 18 months. She has provided volunteer and paid support for individuals in our social network who are recovering from surgery or are elderly and in need of personal care assistance.  She has conducted these assignments with both a good heart and clarity about appropriate helping activities. She has conducted research and educated herself voluntarily about the needs of such individuals.

I consider her to be a valued resource to families or individuals who need help in their home.
